56 int w; 57 int h; 58 int refresh_rate; 59 void *driverdata; 60 } SDL_DisplayMode; 61 95 typedef struct SDL_Window SDL_Window; 96 102 typedef enum 103 { 104 SDL_WINDOW_FULLSCREEN = 0x00000001, 105 SDL_WINDOW_OPENGL = 0x00000002, 106 SDL_WINDOW_SHOWN = 0x00000004, 107 SDL_WINDOW_HIDDEN = 0x00000008, 108 SDL_WINDOW_BORDERLESS = 0x00000010, 109 SDL_WINDOW_RESIZABLE = 0x00000020, 110 SDL_WINDOW_MINIMIZED = 0x00000040, 111 SDL_WINDOW_MAXIMIZED = 0x00000080, 112 SDL_WINDOW_MOUSE_GRABBED = 0x00000100, 113 SDL_WINDOW_INPUT_FOCUS = 0x00000200, 114 SDL_WINDOW_MOUSE_FOCUS = 0x00000400, 115 SDL_WINDOW_FULLSCREEN_DESKTOP = ( SDL_WINDOW_FULLSCREEN | 0x00001000 ), 116 SDL_WINDOW_FOREIGN = 0x00000800, 117 SDL_WINDOW_ALLOW_HIGHDPI = 0x00002000, 120 SDL_WINDOW_MOUSE_CAPTURE = 0x00004000, 121 SDL_WINDOW_ALWAYS_ON_TOP = 0x00008000, 122 SDL_WINDOW_SKIP_TASKBAR = 0x00010000, 123 SDL_WINDOW_UTILITY = 0x00020000, 124 SDL_WINDOW_TOOLTIP = 0x00040000, 125 SDL_WINDOW_POPUP_MENU = 0x00080000, 126 SDL_WINDOW_KEYBOARD_GRABBED = 0x00100000, 127 SDL_WINDOW_VULKAN = 0x10000000, 128 SDL_WINDOW_METAL = 0x20000000, 130 SDL_WINDOW_INPUT_GRABBED = SDL_WINDOW_MOUSE_GRABBED 131 } SDL_WindowFlags; 132 136 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_UNDEFINED_MASK 0x1FFF0000u 137 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_UNDEFINED_DISPLAY(X) (SDL_WINDOWPOS_UNDEFINED_MASK|(X)) 138 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_UNDEFINED SDL_WINDOWPOS_UNDEFINED_DISPLAY(0) 139 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_ISUNDEFINED(X) \ 140 (((X)&0xFFFF0000) == SDL_WINDOWPOS_UNDEFINED_MASK) 141 145 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED_MASK 0x2FFF0000u 146 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED_DISPLAY(X) (SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED_MASK|(X)) 147 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED_DISPLAY(0) 148 #define SDL_WINDOWPOS_ISCENTERED(X) \ 149 (((X)&0xFFFF0000) == SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED_MASK) 150 154 typedef enum 155 { 156 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_NONE, 157 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_SHOWN, 158 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_HIDDEN, 159 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_EXPOSED, 161 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MOVED, 163 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_RESIZED, 164 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_SIZE_CHANGED, 167 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MINIMIZED, 168 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_MAXIMIZED, 169 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_RESTORED, 171 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_ENTER, 172 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_LEAVE, 173 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_FOCUS_GAINED, 174 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_FOCUS_LOST, 175 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_CLOSE, 176 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_TAKE_FOCUS, 177 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_HIT_TEST, 178 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_ICCPROF_CHANGED, 179 SDL_WINDOWEVENT_DISPLAY_CHANGED 180 } SDL_WindowEventID; 181 185 typedef enum 186 { 187 SDL_DISPLAYEVENT_NONE, 188 SDL_DISPLAYEVENT_ORIENTATION, 189 SDL_DISPLAYEVENT_CONNECTED, 190 SDL_DISPLAYEVENT_DISCONNECTED 191 } SDL_DisplayEventID; 192 196 typedef enum 197 { 198 SDL_ORIENTATION_UNKNOWN, 199 SDL_ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE, 200 SDL_ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_FLIPPED, 201 SDL_ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT, 202 SDL_ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_FLIPPED 203 } SDL_DisplayOrientation; 204 208 typedef enum 209 { 210 SDL_FLASH_CANCEL, 211 SDL_FLASH_BRIEFLY, 212 SDL_FLASH_UNTIL_FOCUSED 213 } SDL_FlashOperation; 214 218 typedef void *SDL_GLContext; 219 223 typedef enum 224 { 225 SDL_GL_RED_SIZE, 226 SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE, 227 SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE, 228 SDL_GL_ALPHA_SIZE, 229 SDL_GL_BUFFER_SIZE, 230 SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 231 SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE, 232 SDL_GL_STENCIL_SIZE, 233 SDL_GL_ACCUM_RED_SIZE, 234 SDL_GL_ACCUM_GREEN_SIZE, 235 SDL_GL_ACCUM_BLUE_SIZE, 236 SDL_GL_ACCUM_ALPHA_SIZE, 237 SDL_GL_STEREO, 238 SDL_GL_MULTISAMPLEBUFFERS, 239 SDL_GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES, 240 SDL_GL_ACCELERATED_VISUAL, 241 SDL_GL_RETAINED_BACKING, 242 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION, 243 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION, 244 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_EGL, 245 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_FLAGS, 246 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK, 247 SDL_GL_SHARE_WITH_CURRENT_CONTEXT, 248 SDL_GL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE, 249 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR, 250 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_RESET_NOTIFICATION, 251 SDL_GL_CONTEXT_NO_ERROR 252 } SDL_GLattr;
